# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(emc LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(emc SHARED "")
set_target_properties(emc PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "emc")
set_target_properties(emc PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
set_target_properties(emc PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
target_include_directories(emc PRIVATE
    src/third_party/gmsdk/include
)
target_include_directories(emc PRIVATE
    C:/Users/Administrator/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/c/cocoyaxi/v2.0.3/3ee60460ddd140dfb51da04c9240b899/include
)
target_compile_features(emc PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(emc PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(emc PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(emc PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(emc PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET emc PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(emc PRIVATE
    gmsdk
    co
)
target_link_directories(emc PRIVATE
    src/third_party/gmsdk/lib/win64
    C:/Users/Administrator/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/c/cocoyaxi/v2.0.3/3ee60460ddd140dfb51da04c9240b899/lib
)
target_sources(emc PRIVATE
    src/interface.cpp
)

# target
add_executable(emc_demo "")
set_target_properties(emc_demo PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "emc_demo")
set_target_properties(emc_demo PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/debug")
add_dependencies(emc_demo emc)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(emc_demo PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(emc_demo PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(emc_demo PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(emc_demo PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET emc_demo PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(emc_demo PRIVATE
    emc
)
target_link_directories(emc_demo PRIVATE
    build/windows/x64/debug
)
target_sources(emc_demo PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
